TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ConfigurationSaveMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines which properties are written out to a configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ConfigurationSaveMode enumeration values identify which properties are written out to a configuration file when calling the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.Save%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SaveAs%2A> methods.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode Full = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Causes all properties to be written to the configuration file. This is useful mostly for creating information configuration files or moving configuration values from one machine to another.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode Minimal = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Causes only properties that differ from inherited values to be written to the configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationSaveMode Modified = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Causes only modified properties to be written to the configuration file, even when the value is the same as the inherited value.
